item.description:
**Thanks to Chikako for organizing this event!**

Okay, it's time. Get those dancing shoes out. Salsa, merengue, bachata, cha-cha. Latin and hot. Here's the plan.

Meet at the Enormous Room at 8:30 ($3 cover after 9pm) We'll leave at 9:15 and walk over to the Havana Club (Greek Club) for lessons at 9:30. It's a huge space, and they will teach both beginner and intermediate lessons simultaneously. After that, free dancing until 2:00!

Enormous Room (Above Central Kitchen)
569 Mass Ave (Cross Street, Pearl Street)
Cambridge, MA 02139

617-491-5550

Greek Club
2nd Floor Ballroom
288 Green Street
Central Square, Cambridge

www.havanaclubsalsa.com

$12.00 including lesson

You can reach me at 646-541-0708 if you have questions or needs directions. My picture is on this site - RSVP so we'll be looking out for you!

For more information, see http://www.havanaclub...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Night - Havana Club/Greek Club
